concept.title: Smart Wait Function
concept.shortdesc: This article shows you how to enable and use the Smart Wait function in .

section.title: Description
section.p: The Smart Wait function tackles the timing issue of automated web testing by automatically waiting for all front end process of a page to complete before taking further test steps.
introduced Smart Wait from version 7.0.0 as a browser extension.
You can download the Smart Wait sample project from our GitHub repository: Smart Wait sample tests.

li.p: version 7.0.0 onwards (Smart Wait as a web extension).
